name: Headhunter (itch)
description:
Headhunter - a simple-but-hard action platformer game where you are a nameless defective cyborg trying to escape a facility. Unfortunately, hundreds of invincible drones are out to get you; should you repel them back with your gun, or should you just run for it?

[A, D] Move left, right

[Space] Jump

[Left Click] Shoot

If you manage to finish the game, please share your best times in the comments!

Made in a 3 day game jam - Quarantine Jam 2020

Developer's Note

Please don't be so harsh on the character's physics, it was very quickly rushed. :( Hope you all have fun, and stay safe!
